\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 16021}

\subsection*{Did I Have Bad Stuff or What?}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{BS}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 0.5 g & smoked & Salvia divinorum & extract - 5x\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 125.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I was interested in trying Salvia D. So I went online and bought me a gram of 5x. Now I have read about this drug and even in very small doses, salvia is a potent drug. Well bullshit. At first I smoked a very tiny pinch and my head felt heavy. So then I smoked 2 more pinches. Nothing more that a heavy head feeling. So then I smoked some more. By the time I had smoked a half of a gram, I just gave up. SALVIA DID NOT WORK FOR ME. So then i had my friend come over. Nothing for him either. Did I have bad stuff or what? I got nothing! That sucks!

\end{document}
